string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/missionId
string.annotation: Mission identifier

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/productType
string.annotation: Product type

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/productVersion
string.annotation: Product type

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/lookDirection
string.annotation: Look direction can be left or right

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/orbitPassDirection
string.annotation: Orbit direction can be ascending or descending

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/zeroDopplerStartTime
string.annotation: Azimuth start time of product

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/zeroDopplerEndTime
string.annotation: Azimuth stop time of product

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/plannedDatatakeId
string.annotation: List of planned datatakes included in the product

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/plannedObservationId
string.annotation: List of planned observations included in the product

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/isUrgentObservation
string.annotation: List of booleans indicating if datatakes are nominal or urgent

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/listOfFrequencies
string.annotation: List of frequency layers available in the product

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/diagnosticModeFlag
string.annotation: Indicates if the radar mode is a diagnostic mode or not: True or False

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/isGeocoded
string.annotation: Flag to indicate radar geometry or geocoded product

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/boundingPolygon
string.annotation: OGR compatible WKT representation of bounding polygon of the image

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/processingType
string.annotation: NOMINAL (or) URGENT (or) CUSTOM (or) UNDEFINED

string.name: /science/LSAR/RSD/instrumentConfigID
string.annotation: Instrument configuration ID

string.name: /science/LSAR/RSD/swaths/frequencyA/listOfTxPolarizations
string.annotation: List of processed polarization layers with frequencyA

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSD/swaths/frequencyA/txH/sceneCenterAlongTrackSpacing
real.annotation: Nominal along track spacing in meters between consecutive lines near mid swath of the SLC image

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSD/swaths/frequencyA/txH/sceneCenterGroundRangeSpacing
real.annotation: Nominal ground range spacing in meters between consecutive pixels near mid swath of the SLC image

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSD/swaths/frequencyA/txH/centerFrequency
real.annotation: Center frequency of the acquisition in Hz. In case of mode combination, this corresponds to the mode with lowest Center Frequency.

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSD/swaths/frequencyA/txH/slantRangeSpacing
real.annotation: Slant range spacing of grid. Same as difference between consecutive samples in slantRange array

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSD/swaths/frequencyA/txH/slantRange
real.annotation: CF compliant dimension associated with slant range

integer.name: /science/LSAR/RSD/swaths/frequencyA/txH/numberOfSubSwaths
integer.annotation: Number of swaths of continuous imagery, due to transmit gaps

integer.name: /science/LSAR/RSD/swaths/frequencyA/txH/validSamplesSubSwath1
integer.annotation: First and last valid sample in each line of 1st subswath

integer.name: /science/LSAR/RSD/swaths/frequencyA/txH/validSamplesSubSwath2
integer.annotation: First and last valid sample in each line of 2nd subswath

integer.name: /science/LSAR/RSD/swaths/frequencyA/txH/validSamplesSubSwath3
integer.annotation: First and last valid sample in each line of 3rd subswath

integer.name: /science/LSAR/RSD/swaths/frequencyA/txH/validSamplesSubSwath4
integer.annotation: First and last valid sample in each line of 3rd subswath

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSD/swaths/frequencyA/txH/rxH/caltone
real.annotation: Pulse-by-pulse phase estimated from Caltone on H-polarization

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSD/swaths/frequencyA/txH/rxV/caltone
real.annotation: Pulse-by-pulse phase estimated from Caltone on V-polarization

integer.name: /science/LSAR/RSD/swaths/frequencyA/txH/rxH/TRMDataWindow
integer.annotation: Pulse-by-pulse list of active receivers on H-polarization

integer.name: /science/LSAR/RSD/swaths/frequencyA/txH/rxV/TRMDataWindow
integer.annotation: Pulse-by-pulse list of active receivers on V-polarization

string.name: /science/LSAR/RSD/telemetry/orbit/orbitType
string.annotation: DOE (or) PeOE (or) NOE (or) MOE (or) POE (or) Custom

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSD/telemetry/attitude/time
real.annotation: Time vector record. This record contains the time corresponding to attitude and quaternion records

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSD/telemetry/attitude/angularVelocity
real.annotation: Attitude angular velocity vectors (wx, wy, wz)

string.name: /science/LSAR/RSD/telemetry/attitude/attitudeType
string.annotation: PrOE (or) NOE (or) MOE (or) POE (or) Custom

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSD/telemetry/txH/rxH/QFSP/Time
real.annotation: Time tags for QFSP telemetry entries

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSD/telemetry/txH/rxH/QFSP/ADCDelay
real.annotation: ADC channel delays from Bypass Cal

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSD/telemetry/txH/rxV/QFSP/Time
real.annotation: Time tags for QFSP telemetry entries

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSD/telemetry/txH/rxV/QFSP/ADCDelay
real.annotation: ADC channel delays from Bypass Cal

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSD/telemetry/txH/rxH/SSP/Time
real.annotation: Time tags for QFSP telemetry entries

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSD/telemetry/txH/rxV/SSP/Time
real.annotation: Time tags for QFSP telemetry entries

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSD/telemetry/txH/rxH/SIF/Time
real.annotation: Time tags for SIF telemetry entries

real.name: /science/LSAR/RSD/telemetry/txH/rxV/SIF/Time
real.annotation: Time tags for SIF telemetry entries

string.name: /science/LSAR/RSD/metadata/processingInformation/inputs/l0aGranules
string.annotation: List of input L0A products used

string.name: /science/LSAR/RSD/metadata/processingInformation/inputs/auxcalFiles
string.annotation: List of input calibration files used

string.name: /science/LSAR/RSD/metadata/processingInformation/inputs/configFiles
string.annotation: List of input config files used

shape.name: numberOfFrequencies
shape.annotation: Number of L-SAR frequencies in product

shape.name: alongTrackTimeLength
shape.annotation: Number of range lines in datasets

shape.name: numberOfFrequencyAPolarizations
shape.annotation: Number of polarization layers associated with L-SAR frequency A

shape.name: frequencyASlantRangeWidth
shape.annotation: Number of pixels in all L-SAR frequency A imagery datasets

shape.name: complexDataFrequencyAShape
shape.annotation: Shape associated with L-SAR frequency A imagery datasets

shape.name: TRMPulseShape
shape.annotation: Shape associated with L-SAR TxCal datasets

shape.name: TRM3TapPulseShape
shape.annotation: Shape associated with L-SAR Caltone datasets

shape.name: validSamplesShape
shape.annotation: Shape associated with L-SAR valid samples dataset

shape.name: orbitShape
shape.annotation: Shape of orbit state vector triplets dataset

shape.name: attitudeShape
shape.annotation: Shape of attitude Euler angle triplets dataset
